a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Time women and men spend on leisure
The average time women and men aged 15-65 spend on leisure activities. Surveys for most countries were
conducted between 2009 and 2016, but some countries have older surveys.

text.textPath: Men and women spend equal time on leisure
Men and women spend equal time on leisure
Men spend 50% more time on leisure
Men spend 50% more time on leisure
Women spend 50% more time on leisure
Women spend 50% more time on leisure

text.tspan: Note: Leisure activities include sports, attending events, visiting friends, watching TV, among others.
